movies.title: RetroStrange TV
movies.shortDescription: A community-supported 24/7 streaming TV channel based on public domain media and original content. Support us at http://patreon.com/philnelson
movies.longDescription: A community-supported 24/7 streaming TV channel based on public domain media and original content. Support us at http://patreon.com/philnelson

movies.title: RetroStrange Radio1
movies.shortDescription: RetroStrange Radio1 - A 24/7 stream of Old Time Radio science fiction programs such as Dimension X and X-Minus One.
movies.longDescription: RetroStrange Radio1 - A 24/7 stream of Old Time Radio science fiction programs such as Dimension X and X-Minus One.

movies.title: RetroStrange Radio2
movies.shortDescription: RetroStrange Radio2 - A 24/7 stream of public domain music from the 1920s and 1930s.
movies.longDescription: RetroStrange Radio2 - A 24/7 stream of public domain music from the 1920s and 1930s.

movies.title: RetroStrange Channel Promo
movies.shortDescription: A short trailer for the channel. No ads, no tracking, ever! https://retrostrange.com
